name: Halloween Mysteries
description: Dive into the fantastic world of magic and mysteries. In the world full of wonders, unusual creatures, witches and demons. In the world where something which you have not yet encountered awaits you in every corner.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD速 FX-6300 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA速 GeForce GTX 750 Ti / ATI Radeon HD 7950 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 / AMD速 FX-8350 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA速 GeForce GTX 970 / ATI Radeon R9 series DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device
